AI Description: Transformers is a state-of-the-art natural language processing library, which provides thousands of pre-trained models for various NLP tasks. It offers an easy-to-use API for training and fine-tuning models on custom datasets.
Core Features: Pre-Trained Models For Nlp Tasks, Support For Sequence Classification, Token Classification, Question Answering, Language Modeling, & More, Easy-To-Use Api For Model Training & Fine-Tuning, Integration With Popular Deep Learning Frameworks Like Pytorch & Tensorflow
